mapper.select: SELECT u_id AS uId, u_email AS uEmail, u_social AS uSocial, u_pw AS uPw, u_nickname AS uNickName, u_birth AS uBirth, u_addr AS uAddr, u_role AS uRole, u_regDate AS uRegDate, u_enabled AS uEnabled FROM user_info ui ORDER by u_regDate DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET ${startRow};
SELECT count(*) AS totalCnt FROM user_info
